title: Renewing Cleanser
description: This pore-purifying cleanser is an all-time favorite, this refreshing gel is a 2-in-1 cleanser that removes impurities, dirt, and makeup without dehydrating your skin.

content.title: Lactic Acid
content.body: is a gentle way to help control oiliness and breakouts, and even helps repair acne scars. It also removes skin cells from the surface of the skin, leaving a brighter more even complexion.

content.title: Hyaluronic Acid
content.body: is a powerful humectant that plumps and retains moisture, for a more supple and youthful appearance

content.title: Green Tea Extract
content.body: helps diminish the signs of aging, calms irritation, evens out discoloration, diminishes the appearance of cellulite, soothes redness and swelling, repairs damage, exfoliates, decreases the appearance and occurrence of blackheads, eliminates dead skin, dirt, bacteria, and other pollutants on the skin’s surface, decreases puffiness, and reduces the appearance of dark circles.

content.title: Marimoist
content.body: is a hydrator and skin conditioner, it hydrates the skin by creating an ionic barrier forming a reservoir of bound water.

content.title: Geranium oil
content.body: is a hydrator and skin conditioner, it hydrates the skin by creating an ionic barrier forming a reservoir of bound water.

content.title: Sweet Iris
content.body: sweet iris leaves have the unique ability to encourage a tighter, firmer, more youthful look. At the same time, sweet iris has a moisturizing capability too, softening and plumping skin.

sections.title: How To Use
content: Make sure your face and/or neck is already damp
Give the Renewing Cleanser a quick shake before use
Squeeze the bottle contents onto your fingertips, the amount the size of a dime should be enough
Work the gel cleanser into a lather
Using small circles gently massage onto your face and neck
Rinse with water
Dry your face without rubbing, use a patting motion to soak up excess moisture

title: Refreshing Mist
description: This alcohol-free pH balancing & resurfacing treatment contains natural and invigorating aromas that will send you into a world of relaxation. This refreshing mist is designed to absorb excess sebum, leaving your skin looking smooth and even.

content.title: Cypress Oil
content.body: Has antibacterial, antifungal, and antiviral properties and is also an astringent. Give you the appearance of tightened pores and reduce the presence of excess sebum.

content.title: Lavender Oil
content.body: Works to kill bacteria, and this can prevent and heal acne breakouts. It can aid in skin lightening since it reduces inflammation. It can reduce discoloration, including dark spots. Free radicals are partly responsible for fine lines and wrinkles on the face. Lavender oil is full of antioxidants, which help protect you from the free radicals.

content.title: Rosemary Oil
content.body: Has natural antiseptic properties, can help protect skin from sun damage

content.title: Geranium Oil
content.body: Eliminates dead skin cells, tightens skin, promotes regeneration of new skin, it also helps diminish the signs of aging

sections.title: How To Use
content: This product is contained within a mist type application
Give the Refreshing Mist a quick shake before use
Hold 12 inches away from your face and press down, it will release a fine mist.
Do this 3-5 times make sure to cover your entire face and neck and immersive yourself with the calming lavender scent
Once you have finished spraying do not rub in, simply use a patting motion and let it soak into your skin

title: Restoring Serum
description: This serum will deliver dramatic results in just a couple of treatments. This serum helps reduce the look of dark spots (signs of hyperpigmentation), while our blend of ingredients we dubbed the ‘recharger’ tones and firms your skin throughout the day.

content.title: Geranium Rose Oil
content.body: Eliminates dead skin cells, tightens skin, promotes regeneration of new skin, diminishes signs of aging.

content.title: Lavender Oil
content.body: Reduces acne, lightens skin, reduces wrinkles.

content.title: Rosemary Oil
content.body: Has natural antiseptic properties, can help protect skin from sun damage.

content.title: Cypress Oil
content.body: Soothes and calms inflamed skin, provides astringent properties for tissue healing and antibacterial support for the skin.

content.title: Orchistem
content.body: are orchid stem cells that enhance and improve communication between skin stem cells and fibroblasts that result in a global rejuvenating effect

content.title: Capucine
content.body: Cleanse and Purify the Skin, decongests the pores by stimulating healthy cell turnover revealing a younger, smoother complexion. It visually changes the surface condition of your skin while increasing cell turn over rate for a healthy glow

content.title: Riboxyl
content.body: Helps eliminate crows feet (wrinkles around your eyes)

content.title: Vitasource
content.body: Delays the ageing of cells, while increasing cell duplication by 10%, it also helps improve skin firmness and elasticity.

content.title: Seborilys
content.body: is a multifunctional sebum regulator derived entirely from plant sources. It limits sebum production, treats greasy skin, and limits skin irritation.

sections.title: How To Use
content: This product is contained within an airtight container, when you first receive your product you need to press the top of the jar 2-3 times to bring the product to the surface (you will only need to do this once)
Give the Restoring Serum a quick shake before use
Apply it by using 2-3 pumps and massaging it into your face and neck using your ring finger and a circular motion twice per day.
Focus Application around eyes and troubled area

title: Radiating Cream
description: The perfect do-it-all day & night moisturizer. This lightweight mega-moisturizer has clinical-grade ingredients that visibly brightens and delivers intense hydration for bright, bouncy skin.

content.title: Gatuline Skin Repair Bio
content.body: stimulates optimal reconstruction for dry or damaged skin. It promotes natural regeneration for fresher, smoother & more radiant skin. Restores skin barrier function, it also preserves the skin from dehydration.

content.title: Slimagine
content.body: active slimming ingredient with anti yo-yo effect, it reduces the storage of body fat within the face.

content.title: Chufa Milk
content.body: nourishes, softens, provides elasticity and helps to maintain fantastic skin hydration.

content.title: Hyaluronic Acid
content.body: is a powerful humectant that plumps and retains moisture, for a more supple and youthful appearance

content.title: NaturePep Pea
content.body: visibly reduces dark spots, red spots & hyperpigmentation for a more uniform & even complexion

content.title: Tonka Bean Extract
content.body: acts as an optical brightener, reducing appearance of uneven skin tone.

content.title: Geranium Rose Oil
content.body: eliminates dead skin cells, tightens skin, promotes regeneration of new skin, and diminishes signs of aging.

sections.title: How To Use
content: This product is contained within an airtight container, when you first receive your product you need to press the top of the jar 2-3 times to bring the product to the surface (you will only need to do this once)
Give the Radiating cream a quick shake before use
Apply it by using 1 pump and massaging it into your face and neck using circular motion twice per day.
Focus Application around eyes and troubled area
